txt.en:
'Oh, hello there, slow-poke. I told you I am very fast. Would you care to have another race?

'I will give you an even longer head start this time.

'Let us race to the stable at the far south-west side of town.'
Race Grimwald to the stable in the south-west of town
The end of your race with Grimwald is at the stable in the south-west of town.\n\nYou should race Grimwald to the stable.
Grimwald, son of Grimbold, has challenged you to a race. Outrunning such a small fellow should not be difficult.
